1�Use the 3����?Yes.No.
1�You rap on the gate using the same pattern you saw in the pictographs.You hear the creaking sound of a bar lifting on the other side of the gat
1�Leave through the gate?Yes.No.
1�Exit? (You cannot reenter here.)Yes.Not now.
1�Oh my Gob! You're one of those adventurerurers, aren't ya?You got nothin' on me, �[man./lady.] I was just mindin' my own businesesess, lookin' for junk an' stuff.
1�Hey, watch out. You don't wanna fight me. I'll turn you into meat jerky!Wait, how about you and me be friends instead? Sound good?
1�I travel all over the world and hear lots of differererent stories. I even hear your stories. I can tell you one, if you want.
1�Do you want to hear a story?No, thank you.Let's hear one.
1�What story would you like to be told?On second thought, maybe later.Get the Picture.
1�Oh...Well, if that's the case, I'm outta here.

1�Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!
1�Huh? Why aren't you jumping out of your skin in absolute terror?I would've died of fright, kupo!
1�Here, take this as a testament to your courage.Exchange it for the item your partner received so you can prove that you both reached the goal safely, kupo!
1�Return with the evidence of your success to the moogle in town. Handing over your partner's item will prove that you were both able to reach me, kupo!
1�Oh, and here's a picture of how your partner's face looked when I popped out of nowhere to scare you. You should hand this in at the same time, kupo!Kupupupu...
1�This place is crawling with nasties.You should probably head back to town so you can testify to your partner's bravery.
1�Boo-hah-hah�`...kupo!
1�Why do ghosts say ��boo,�� anyway?
1�I heard that going to a dark, scary dungeon is the best way to test your courage.This place definitely qualifies, kupo!
1�Maybe I'm doing something wrong, kupo?
1�If it gets out that I haven't scared the wits out of a single person yet, I'm going to get into trouble, kupo...
